sourcesContent:
Rotten Potatoes
Rotten Potatoes is the world’s most trusted recommendation resources for quality entertainment. As the leading online aggregator of movie and TV show reviews from critics, we provide fans with a comprehensive guide to what’s Fresh – and what’s Rotten – in theaters and at home. If you’re an entertainment fan looking for a recommendation, or to share an opinion, you’ve come to the right place.
